title: 5 and 8 of the Civil Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2022 (No. 19 of 2022)
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Civil Law (Miscellaneous Provisions)
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Civil Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) 

Act 2022 (Parts 1, 4, 5 and 8) (Commencement) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited civil law (miscellaneous provisions) act 2022 (parts 1 4 5 8) (commencement) order 2022

title: 5 and 8 of the Civil Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2022 (No. 19 of 2022)
heading: 2. The 22nd day of July 2022 is appointed as the day on which Parts 1, 4,
text_raw:
2. The 22nd day of July 2022 is appointed as the day on which Parts 1, 4, 
5 and 8 of the Civil Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2022 (No. 19 of 2022) 
shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

21 July, 2022. 

HELEN MCENTEE, 
Minister for Justice. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 26th July, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [370] 3

ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
